about_the_game:
Embark on a classic survival horror experrience where you unlock new areas, solve puzzles and discover mysteries!

Engage in a deep narrative-focused adventure full of conflict and exploration as you play as Caradine, a young operative in a deadly mission for her homeland.




Twelve years after the War of the Beast, the sovereignty of the Cethra Empire ran unchallenged.

A team of operatives are deployed on a oil rig to investigate an incident in one of Preven's Gulf platforms.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of violent acts, drug usage, gore, and general mature content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 TI (2GB) or AMD Radeon HD 6570 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4GB) or AMD AMD Radeon RX 550 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A survival horror set in a world full of mysteries, abominations and political intrigue. Explore a rich and deep narrative as the young imperial operative Caradine Wilvers, as she search for answers on a desolate place.
